languages.text: "Так и объясним — довели людей в край, вот они и срываются. Будто не знаем мы, зачем с верхних палуб отряды посылают, как вон тот, который Аврилла не пускала".

"Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."
languages.original_text: "Так и объясним — довели людей в край, вот они и срываются. Будто не знаем мы, зачем с верхних палуб отряды посылают, как вон тот, который Аврилла не пускала".

traits.locale_text: "Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

traits.locale_text: "Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."

languages.text: “我可以解释，这里的人被逼到了份上，他们已经什么都不顾了。别以为我们不知道那群顶层甲板的人打算下来干什么，比如那边被中尉拦下来的那个家伙。”
languages.original_text: "Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."

traits.locale_text: “我可以解释，这里的人被逼到了份上，他们已经什么都不顾了。别以为我们不知道那群顶层甲板的人打算下来干什么，比如那边被中尉拦下来的那个家伙。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: «Esta es su explicación: han llevado a la gente de aquí al límite y ahora están estallando. Como si no supiéramos para qué están mandando a las unidades de las cubiertas superiores, como esa a la que la teniente no deja pasar».
languages.original_text: "Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."

traits.locale_text: «Esta es su explicación: han llevado a la gente de aquí al límite y ahora están estallando. Como si no supiéramos para qué están mandando a las unidades de las cubiertas superiores, como esa a la que la teniente no deja pasar».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: 「こいつが説明だよ…人々は限界まで追い込まれ、今暴れ出したのさ。少尉が通そうとしなかったような、上層デッキの部隊がどうして送り込まれてくるのか、まるでわからないね」
languages.original_text: "Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."

traits.locale_text: 「こいつが説明だよ…人々は限界まで追い込まれ、今暴れ出したのさ。少尉が通そうとしなかったような、上層デッキの部隊がどうして送り込まれてくるのか、まるでわからないね」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: "Hier ist Eure Erklärung: Die Leute wurden an ihre Grenzen getrieben, und nun wehren sie sich. Als wüssten wir nicht, warum die Einheiten vom Oberdeck hier runtergeschickt werden. Wie die Einheit, die den Lieutenant nicht passieren lassen will."
languages.original_text: "Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."

traits.locale_text: "Hier ist Eure Erklärung: Die Leute wurden an ihre Grenzen getrieben, und nun wehren sie sich. Als wüssten wir nicht, warum die Einheiten vom Oberdeck hier runtergeschickt werden. Wie die Einheit, die den Lieutenant nicht passieren lassen will."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: « La voilà, votre explication : à force de pousser les gens dans leurs derniers retranchements, certains ont décidé de se défendre. On sait tous très bien ce que ces unités des ponts supérieurs viennent faire ici, à commencer par cet escadron que la lieutenante refuse de laisser passer. »
languages.original_text: "Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."

traits.locale_text: « La voilà, votre explication : à force de pousser les gens dans leurs derniers retranchements, certains ont décidé de se défendre. On sait tous très bien ce que ces unités des ponts supérieurs viennent faire ici, à commencer par cet escadron que la lieutenante refuse de laisser passer. »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderOld

languages.text: "İzahı basit. Milletin sabrı taştı, artık dayanamıyorlar. Sanki biz, üst güverteden gelen birimlerin burada ne aradığını bilmiyoruz. Teğmenin, geçmesine müsaade etmediği şu birim gibi."
languages.original_text: "Here's an explanation for you — the people have been pushed to their limit, and now they're lashing out. As if we don't know why these top deck units are being sent down here, like that one there that the lieutenant won't let past."

traits.locale_text: "İzahı basit. Milletin sabrı taştı, artık dayanamıyorlar. Sanki biz, üst güverteden gelen birimlerin burada ne aradığını bilmiyoruz. Teğmenin, geçmesine müsaade etmediği şu birim gibi."
